sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import '../Style/Work.scss'; export default ({ backgroundColor, fontColor, Index, Title, Date, Tech, demoLink, githubLink, Text, Images }) => { const [ active, setActive ] = useState('') useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setActive('--active'); }, 500) }, []); return (
Work {Index}
Back

{Title}

DATE
{Date}
TECH
{Tech}
LINK
  • {demoLink}
  • {githubLink}

{Text}

{Images}
) }
